mapper.select: select *,users.name,users.email from terms LEFT JOIN users ON terms.pid = users.id where type = 0 and pid=#{uid} order by terms.createTime desc limit 0,20
mapper.insert: insert into terms (title, content, pid, posts, type, createTime) values (#{title},#{content},#{uid},#{posts},#{type},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update posts set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, posts=#{posts} where id = #{id}
